mapper.update: update chinese.article set article.title=#{article.title}, article.content=#{article.content}, article.tag=#{article.tag}, article.img=#{article.img}, article.des=#{article.des}, article.time=#{article.time} where article.id = #{article.id}
mapper.select: select id, author, title, des, `view`, `like`, `time`, img, tag, top from chinese.article where pass = 1;
select id, title, des from chinese.article where pass=true order by `like` desc limit #{size}
select id, title, des from chinese.article where top=1;
